app_desc.message: A collection of UserScripts that enhance the web client experience for Mei v11.

MeiV11EmojisPaletteForMovileTextArea_nam.message: Emoji palette for mobile text area

MisskeyDifferentColorLocalOnly_name.message: Use a different color for the "Local only" post scope icon

MisskeyV11BackToTop_name.message: Add a back to top button

MisskeyV11ReactionPickerExpandWidth_name.message: Display the reaction picker at the bottom of the screen (for mobile mode)

MisskeyV11RemoteCustomEmojiMarker_name.message: Make remote custom emojis stand out
